quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
author: Master Oogway

quote: There are no accidents.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Your mind is like water. When it's agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear.
author: Master Shifu

quote: If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than you are now.
author: Master Shifu

quote: I'm not a big fat panda. I'm THE big fat panda.
author: Po

quote: There is no secret ingredient. It's just you.
author: Mr. Ping

quote: The more you take, the less you have.
author: Master Oogway

quote: To make something special, you just believe it's special.
author: Mr. Ping

quote: The hardest part is letting go of the illusion of control.
author: Master Shifu

quote: We often meet our destiny on the path we take to avoid it.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Your story may not have such a happy beginning, but that doesn't make you who you are. It is the rest of your story, who you choose to be.
author: Soothsayer

quote: Anything is possible when you have inner peace.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Before the battle of the fist comes the battle of the mind.
author: Master Shifu

quote: The only thing that matters is what you choose to be now.
author: Po

quote: There is always something more to learn, even for a master.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Inner peace comes from within.
author: Master Shifu

quote: The mark of a true hero is humility.
author: Master Shifu

quote: You must let go of the illusion of control.
author: Master Oogway

quote: I'm not trying to turn you into me. I'm trying to turn you into you.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Real strength comes from being your true self.
author: Po

quote: Sometimes you eat the dumpling, sometimes the dumpling eats you.
author: Mr. Ping

quote: Don't push past memories deeper inside of yourself. Let those memories breathe and set them free.
author: Master Shifu

quote: The past is the past. You gotta let go of it.
author: Po

quote: When will you realize? The more you take, the less you have.
author: Master Oogway

quote: There is no good news or bad news. There is just news.
author: Master Oogway

quote: The true path to victory is to find your opponent's weakness and make him suffer for it.
author: Tai Lung

quote: You are too concerned with what was and what will be.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Your real strength comes from being the best you you can be.
author: Po

quote: The secret to limitless power lies in mastering chi.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Who knows the ways of the universe? Certainly not a mortal like me.
author: Master Oogway

quote: To find your destiny, you must let go of the illusion of control.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Every adventure is an opportunity for growth.
author: Po

quote: A true warrior never gives up.
author: Master Tigress

quote: Sometimes the path we think we should follow is not the one we're meant to take.
author: Master Oogway

quote: In the end, all that matters is what you become.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Po

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Master Shifu

quote: A warrior never blames others for their own shortcomings.
author: Master Tigress

quote: The best recipes are handed down from heart to heart.
author: Mr. Ping

quote: True power lies not in the strength of your fists, but in the strength of your heart.
author: Master Oogway

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single dumpling.
author: Mr. Ping

quote: Sometimes life can be bitter, like a cup of cold noodles.
author: Mr. Ping

quote: You must believe in yourself. That's the real secret.
author: Po

quote: A real warrior never quits.
author: Master Tigress

quote: The path to victory lies within.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Every mistake is an opportunity to learn.
author: Master Oogway

quote: The greatest enemy is the one inside yourself.
author: Master Shifu

quote: A true master is an eternal student.
author: Master Oogway

quote: The secret of the dragon scroll is within you.
author: Master Shifu

quote: There is no greater power than the power of belief.
author: Po

quote: A warrior's greatest weapon is patience.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Your destiny is what you make of it.
author: Master Oogway

quote: The past can hurt, but you can either run from it or learn from it.
author: Po

quote: True strength comes from the heart.
author: Master Tigress

quote: In kung fu, speed is nothing without accuracy.
author: Master Shifu

quote: A true warrior fights not because they hate what is in front of them, but because they love what is behind them.
author: Master Oogway

quote: The best noodles take time, just like the best warriors.
author: Mr. Ping

quote: Your story is still being written. Make it a good one.
author: Po

quote: The greatest victories are those that require no battle.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Sometimes the hardest person to forgive is yourself.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Every day is a new opportunity to become legendary.
author: Po

quote: The best time to plant a tree was twenty years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Master Oogway

quote: True mastery comes from understanding, not just knowing.
author: Master Shifu

quote: The secret ingredient of success is believing in yourself.
author: Po

quote: A warrior's greatest strength is knowing their own weakness.
author: Master Tigress

quote: The path to inner peace starts with acceptance.
author: Master Oogway

quote: You cannot fill your cup until you empty it first.
author: Master Shifu

quote: The way to a warrior's heart is through their stomach.
author: Mr. Ping

quote: Sometimes we do the wrong things for the right reasons.
author: Po

quote: The journey of self-discovery never ends.
author: Master Oogway

quote: A single grain of rice can tip the scale.
author: Master Shifu

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Po

quote: Inner strength comes from outer challenges.
author: Master Tigress

quote: The present is a gift. Use it wisely.
author: Master Oogway

quote: In every defeat, there is a lesson.
author: Master Shifu

quote: A true hero's strength lies in their heart.
author: Po

quote: Patience is not just waiting, but how we act while waiting.
author: Master Oogway

quote: The greatest battles are fought within.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Every ending is just a new beginning.
author: Po

quote: True courage is facing your fears.
author: Master Tigress

quote: The path to greatness is paved with small steps.
author: Master Oogway

quote: A master's strength lies in their ability to learn from their students.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Sometimes the best action is no action.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Your greatest weakness can become your greatest strength.
author: Po

quote: The warrior's path is endless.
author: Master Tigress

quote: In quietness comes understanding.
author: Master Oogway

quote: True wisdom comes from experience.
author: Master Shifu

quote: Every warrior was once a beginner.
author: Po

quote: The strongest tree has the deepest roots.
author: Master Oogway

quote: Your mind is your strongest weapon.
author: Master Shifu

quote: The best victories are the ones that unite us.
author: Po

quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Master Tigress

quote: Each moment contains infinite possibilities.
author: Master Oogway
